messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning]
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/23/2004 10:41:59 PM Eastern Daylight Time, nadmo@adelphia.net writes: I wonder if I had worded the plea differently ( please, I m
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/23/2004 10:41:59 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
nadmo@... writes:
I wonder if I had worded the plea differently
("please, I'm vulnerable, so if you can't give advice without first
being mean, just give me fair warning in the e-mail's subjsct so that I
can delete your message and not get my feelings hurt..."). <<<<<<<<


Ummmmm.....I don't think this would have gone over much better! <bwg>

Many of us *have* met each other IRL. The Live and Learn Unschooling
Conference is coming up quickly in August in Peabody, MA. Don't miss it! It would be a
great place for you and your son to meet a bunch of other unschoolers. I can
almost guarantee he would meet someone with shared interests!

I also want to mention that AlwaysLearning is really a group for "seasoned"
unschoolers. Maybe you'd be happier on -101? Unschooling-101@yahoogroups.com

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
